sections.lyrics:
Oh, the sun is shining bright
Filling everything with light!
sections.name: Chorus
Verse 2
sections.lyrics:
Through the fields we wander
Beneath the sky so blue...

sections.name: Bridge
sections.lyrics:
A moment of reflection
A peaceful, quiet view.

sections.name: Outro
sections.lyrics: Fading light now calls us home Until we meet again. A moment of reflection A peaceful, quiet view. A moment of reflection A peaceful, quiet view.
